metrics.name: code_correctness
metrics.description: Whether the generated code is syntactically correct and logically sound
metrics.guidelines:
Score 1: Syntax errors or fundamentally broken logic
Score 2: Runs but produces incorrect results
Score 3: Mostly correct with some edge case failures
Score 4: Correct with minor style issues
Score 5: Perfect correctness and best practices

metrics.name: code_clarity
metrics.description: How readable and maintainable the code is
metrics.guidelines:
Score 1: Unreadable or obfuscated code
Score 2: Difficult to understand, poor naming
Score 3: Readable with some unclear sections
Score 4: Clear with good structure
Score 5: Exceptionally clear, self-documenting code

metrics.name: efficiency
metrics.description: Time and space complexity of the solution
metrics.guidelines:
Score 1: Highly inefficient algorithm
Score 2: Suboptimal complexity
Score 3: Acceptable but not optimal
Score 4: Near-optimal solution
Score 5: Optimal time and space complexity

flags.name: uses_deprecated_apis
flags.description: Code uses deprecated or outdated APIs
